metadata.description: The road to the World Warrior Tournament begins here! In this epic six-issue mini-series, superstar artist Alvin Lee is joined by a host of top-flight artists and illustrators to tell the tale of the most epic fights, the toughest training, and the exotic locales that prepare the Street Fighters for the greatest challenge of their lives! Ryu, Chun-Li, Dhalsim, Cammy, Rose, and the deadly M. Bison all set the stage for the greatest battles of all time!
metadata.name: Street Fighter II
